name: Paul Bowman
note:
Hello Paul,

I represent an outstaffing company from Ukraine. We have a huge number of remote employees for online work and would be happy to propose you cooperation.

Would you consider hiring Ukrainian remote marketing employees on a full/part time basis for a reasonable price?
Seen by Paul Bowman at 10:27 AM.
View Ol'ha’s profileOl'ha Kovalenko
Ol'ha Kovalenko  11:05 AM
Paul,
Thanks for adding me!

Among our specialists are developers, illustrators, designers, lead generation managers, marketers, and video editors.

Оur website https://rh-s.com/ there is a CV of our employees and their work experience and skills.

We can find a fit for you and of course explain our model.

What sphere are you interested in?

Result:

Company Name:  Studiospace
Company Website:  http://www.studiospace.com
Contact Person: Paul Bowman

Specialties: Advertising Services
Country-Location: UK

Target Audience: worldwide

Immediate Requirement: They want to work with us on a different model, where we will work mostly by ourselves (creating a proposal, organizing a team, deciding how many hours it will take, how much will it cost, building a plan of projects etc).



Next Step: sending presentation, organizing 2nd meeting to discuss options for collaborations

Next Contact Date: keep in touch via email

SM Marina (Ruzaliya)

Fresh Result:

It was the second call with Studiospace company. We discussed options for collaboration. The client will send us project descriptions.

Next contact date: keep in touch via email

SM Marina (Ruzaliya)

name: Anders Terrs
note:
update

Company Name: Fabeo Sverige (Sweden)

Company Website : https://www.fabeo.se

Contact Person : Anders Terrs
 
Specialties: Machinery

Country-Location : Sweden

Target Audience: worldwide

Immediate Requirement: Their company works with lots of companies all over the world: Litvenia, Poland, Sweden, US, Eastern Europe. Their sailing products are machines. An Illustrator is creating for them pictures and as for now they need a content manager to write articles and posts to clients to sale their products. English and Polish knowings has to be ( German is a +) Their open accounts in Facebook. Insta, Youtobe channel, Tiktok. To start Anders wants to get a plan from the candidates of their view what  and how their are see the company should be posted. 

Next Step: send our presentation with pricing and suitable CVs
Next date: Friday 2d of December 11:00 our time for a hour interview

SM Marina (Ruzaliya)

name: Antun Brcina
note:
update

Company Name:  Streamnow Ag

Company Website:  https://streamnow.ch/

Contact Person: Antun Brcina

Specialties: Information Technology & Services

Country: Switzerland

Target Audience: worldwide

Immediate Requirement: They have a business in web design, 95% of it in real estate. They have a part-time designer (5 year of experience), she is pregnant now, so they need to hire another person who will do Logo design, website layouts, work in figma. He wants to try working with us, 40h. Firstly he will send us a test task. He thinks we have high rates, because their designer has 5 year of experience and works for 500 eur.  

Next Contact Date: he will come back to us within 2 days with his decision about the candidates

Next step: sending presentations, CV,

Company Website:  https://www.linkedin.com/company/evacodes/

Specialties: Software Development

Immediate Requirement: Evacodes хотят работать с нами через аутстафф. name: Adam Rumjahn
note:
Germany
We are going to discuss options for partnership in managing human resources for Orion Medical GmbH in Ukraine.

Website: rh-s.com

Company Website: https://orion-am.com/medical

Comments:    Adam Rumjahn
(https://www.linkedin.com/in/adam-rumjahn-46b95433/?originalSubdomain=de)                  

Interested in lead generators and content generators, SEO. Would like to know their value. At the moment, he has a lot of questions/doubts about settlements between Germany and Ukraine, especially regarding payments in euros and taxes.

Manager: Korzhova Liudmyla

Good evening, 
My name is Marina. I am a sales manager at Remote Helpers Company in Ukraine.
Some time ago you had a call with Andrew, my colleague, and you were interested in hiring. Somehow, you missed the connection, and please, get my honest apologies about that.
I am texting you, cause I’d like to renew our communication and be helpful to you and to your business with our remote employees.
Do you still have the possibility and wish to work with us? Which services might be relevant to you now? Ready for our updates?
Also, here is our website www.rh-s.com with new available candidates and skills that we advise for hire. Please, feel free to if you need any help.
Waiting for your reply,
Kindly,
Marina

need_candidates.comment_requirements:
The client also asked about the possibility of hiring employees with experience in 
Medical Equipment Manufacturing area
